## PersistenceService.save() method

Save a data-package to a zip file and download to the client machine.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
save(projectName?: string): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  projectName | string | <i>(Optional)</i> the project name to save. Default is 'project |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
